蟜字的基本解释

蟜
jiǎo
古书上说的一种毒虫：“蚑、蟜、蝼、蚁闻之，拄喙而不能前。”

蟜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiǎo］
［《廣韻》居夭切，上小，見。］
(1)毒虫名。
(2)传说中的文身野人。
(3)通“矯”。见“蟜蟜”、“夭蟜”。
(4)姓。
[②]［qiáo］
［《廣韻》巨嬌切，平宵，羣。］
见“蠪蟜”。

蟜字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蟜； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1096第40
【唐韻】居夭切【韻會】舉夭切，?音矯。【說文】蟲也。【枚乗·七發】蚑蟜螻蟻聞之拄喙而不能前。　又野人名。【山海經】蟜，其爲人，虎文，脛有䏿，在窮奇東。　又人名。【大戴禮】宰我請問帝嚳。孔子曰：?囂之孫，蟜極之子也。請問帝舜。蟜牛之孫，瞽叟之子也。　又【韻會】夭蟜，龍貌。【王延壽·魯靈光殿賦】旁夭蟜以橫出。　又【前漢·司馬相如傳】夭蟜支格。【註】頻伸也。　又姓。【禮·檀弓】季武子寢疾，蟜固不說齊衰而入見。【通志·氏族略】漢有逸人蟜愼。　又【廣韻】巨嬌切，音橋。蠪蟜，螘也。　又【韻會】有蟜，古諸侯。【晉語】少典娶于有蟜氏。

考證：〔【王逸魯靈光殿賦】〕　謹照原文王逸改王延壽。
蟜字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
蟜字的起名意思

暂无。

insect
Basic explanation of words
insect
jiǎo
A kind of poisonous insect mentioned in ancient books: "Clams, worms, worms, and ants can't move forward when they hear them."
insect
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiǎo］
["Guangyun" Juyao cut, upper elementary school, see you. ]
(1) The name of the poisonous insect.
(2) The legendary tattoo savages.
(3) Through "correction". See "蟜蟜" and "Yao蟜".
(4) Last name.
[②]［qiáo］
["Guang Yun" Ju Jiao cut, flat night, group. ]
See "蠪蟜".
insect

[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蟜; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1096 40
[Tang Yun] Juyao cut [Yunhui] Juyao cut, sound correction. [Said the text] Worms too. [Meicheng·Seven Hair] The worm ants can't move forward when they hear the beak.　Another savage name. 【Shan Hai Jing】蟜, he is a human, tiger writing, has a shank, in Qidong Qidong.　Another name. [Big Daili] Please ask the emperor, please. Confucius said: The grandson of Xiao, the son of Xiaoji. May I ask Emperor Shun. The grandson of the cow, the son of the old man.　[Rhyme Club] Yao Xun, dragon appearance. 【Wang Yanshou·Lu Lingguang Temple Fu】Next to Yaoxun to cross out.　[Previous Han·Sima Xiangru Biography] Yaojia Zhige. [Note] Frequency stretch also.　Another last name. [Li·Tan Gong] Ji Wuzi was sick in bed, and Xu Gu came in without talking about Qi decline. 【Tongzhi·Clan Profile】Han Youyiren Yumin.　[Guang Yun] Ju Jiao cut, sound bridge.韪蟜, ants too.　[Rhyme Club] You Xuan, ancient princes.
